data.text: @tamsin6 I worry so much for my family in the UK. You have been horrendously let down by your leadership.

@joshoconnorchen Yup, truly a total cultural divide on my timeline. Asia and PIs holding the line. To be fair, most people (indigenous & otherwise) I know in Africa never did much, South Americans I know come from places so slammed in 2020 they’re still in a hard place. Western Europeans tho 🤷🏻‍♀️.
@sarahjaneparton Western society attention span and concern for others at work!
@tamsin6 @sarahjaneparton Why are you so reckless? Stay at home, save lives!!!

@sarahjaneparton I'm still wearing masks and regularly testing. It's going to get much harder soon as they are cutting access to free tests. I'm lucky enough that my workplace is still allowing WFH for some of the week but many have no choice. It completely sucks, and I feel powerless 😥
@PhilMoscovitch I’m so sorry. The Eastern provinces did an amazing job. I don’t understand either. It’s a bit heartbreaking, eh?

From the photos and videos they post, my friends in Asia (Taiwan, Malaysia, Hong Kong, the Philippines, Thailand, off the top of my head) and their wider communities are still wearing masks and being cautious. But everyone else... what the heck?
@sarahjaneparton I am in a place that was amazingly successful at keeping it at bay until last December and now we're about to toss all the restrictions, including masking. I don't get it.
